title: Domino's Pizza - Beit HaKerem
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American chain pizzeria with outlets in Israel. Offers vegan cheese and crust including a whole wheat option. When ordering online, scroll down to "vegan zone," and you'll see 3 pizzas featured. One is a do-it-yourself, the other two are "The Veg" and "Israeli". Even though it says there that they are made with mozzarella, the order is marked vegan and vegan cheese only is on the pizza ordered. Also offers vegan calzone (Greek), garlic bread, and cheese fingers (cheesy bread). Online orders can be paid with PayPal.
